title: Essence reaver +Brutalizer -Life steal = Item diversity. [@meddler (?)]
body:
Black cleaver recipe is changing, and we all know that Essence Reaver isn't really useful (excepting maybe for Jayce and Ezreal), so I ~~copied another post~~ have an idea: a rework for Essence Reaver including Brutalizer.

We all know that Essence Reaver is just a weaker version of Bloodthirster, and the only way we can make it attractive at its current state is to plainly buff its stats to be better than Bloodthirster. As I'm really bad at explaining things, I will just post my ideas here and you'll figure out why I made it this way:

{{summoner:31}} **Wannabe Essence reaver: (Let's call it Shinobu's axe, because I want an item named after me)**
*Pickaxe (875g) + 475g = 1,350g*

+25 attack damage
+10% cooldown reduction
**Passive (unique):** Killing a unit restores 6 mana.

> There is a reason why the "mini essence reaver" was never pulled to live, and this item solves the problem. Building this you sacrifice flat AD or sustain in exchange for more spamming potential (more mana regeneration and less cooldown). 

{{item:3508}} **Essence reaver:**
*The Brutalizer (1,337g) + Shinobu's axe (1,350g) + 563g = 3,250g*

+50 attack damage
+20% cooldown reduction
**Passive (unique):** +20 armor penetration
**Passive (unique):** Basic attacks restore mana equal to 3% of the physical damage dealt, increased by 1% per every 1% missing mana (up to 6%).

> AD casters usually benefit more from armor penetration than they do from attack damage, since their abilities have higher base damages (obviously) than a basic attack in exchange of less scaling (they usually don't reach 100% bonus AD, but even if they do, they can't critically strike and they don't benefit from attack speed). Cooldown reduction is the ability-version of attack speed.
The mana restoration passive... I think it should be more clear and intuitive, so I just changed it to 3-6% from 2-8%.

Just comment below what do you think about it.

replies.body: Good job at stealing this idea from Best Scyther KR.

To be fair this is my own idea, I don't even know who's him. I "copied" the idea from [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/zpkbgYs4-giving-essence-reaver-an-identity).

Also I explicitly mentioned that I copied another post:
> I copied another post

I completly agree the Brutalizer fit very well on Essence Reaver, actually Essense Reaver feel like a worse version of BT, maybe the solution don't need a new mini reaver at all maybe the fix can be change the build path and the Reaver passive:

{{item:3134}}  Brutalizer + {{item:1053}}  Vampire Scepter + 963g = 3100g

+60 attack damage
+10% life steal
+10% cooldown reduction
Passive (unique): +10 armor penetration
Passive (unique): **Physical damage** restore mana equal to 2% of the  damage dealt,(up to 6% based on missing mana).
